mainText:
Hello,
I didn't fully know Steve until around the release of the 4th Gen iPod Nano.
I watched the keynote and instantley I said this guy really know what he's
doing and later on he became my hero. I continue to watch all the Keynotes.
I will miss Steve deeply and no matter what his legacy will live on forever
and ever. My heart goes out to his family.
MY HERO IS DEAD!! :(
author: Kurt
